Uses of Package
de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications

  • Packages that use de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications 
    Package Description
    de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications
    Provides interfaces and types to control the java client application area.
    de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications.browser
    Provides interfaces and types for browser based applications in java client.

    This package provides types, interfaces and classes, that are to be used for controlling a browser based application in java client.
  • Classes in de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications used by de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications 
    Class Description
    ApplicationService
    Client service to open tab applications
    ApplicationTab
    Controls the application tab: close it or add TabListener to be notified on tab focus changes.
    ApplicationTabAppearance
    Configuration interface defining the appearance of the related application tab.
    ApplicationTabAppearance.Builder
    Configuration builder to configure tab appearance.
    Usage:
    ApplicationTabAppearance.FontStyle
    The font style types.
    ApplicationTabConfiguration
    Configuration class for application tabs.
    ApplicationType
    Token representing an application type.
    BrowserNodeActionProvider
    Interface providing methods for node based actions.
    BrowserNodeHandler
    Handler for browser node based user interaction.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder.DragContext
    Interface providing access to drag context.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder.DragListener
    A drag listener receiving information on drag events.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder.DropHandler
    A drop handler receiving information on drop events.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder.ElementDecorator
    Decorator for registered elements.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder.SelectionMode
    Selection mode for the registered nodes
    DocumentGoneException
    Exception thrown during access on nodes of documents delivered via BrowserApplication.
    MultiApplication
    MultiApplication interface to open and control multiple applications.
    MultiApplicationConfiguration
    Configuration builder to configure multi applications.
    SwingApplication
    Swingapplication interface to open and control a swing application.
    SwingApplicationConfiguration
    Configuration builder to configure swing applications.
    SwingApplicationConfiguration.ComponentFactory
    Factory to create a component.
    TabListener
    This interface can be used to be informed about tab changes of a specific application tab inside the tab application area.
  • Classes in de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications used by de.espirit.firstspirit.client.gui.applications.browser 
    Class Description
    ApplicationTabConfiguration
    Configuration class for application tabs.
    ApplicationType
    Token representing an application type.
    BrowserNodeHandlerBuilder
    Builder for creating and binding a BrowserNodeHandler.
